amendment.description: An amendment numbered 149 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prohibit use of funds for "adoptive seizures," wherein law enforcement evades stricter state laws governing civil asset forfeiture by seizing property and referring it to federal authorities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 149 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prohibit use of funds for "adoptive seizures," wherein law enforcement evades stricter state laws governing civil asset forfeiture by seizing property and referring it to federal authorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A008) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
